V0206_01_00_00_0.text:
Kuribon!
Me and you form a mighty two!

V0206_01_00_01_0.text: With my friends by my side, how can I lose?

V0206_01_00_02_0.text:
Sure!
I'd love to Duel you anytime!

V0206_01_00_03_0.text: I have to train harder so that Leo can't beat me!

V0206_01_00_04_0.text:
I'm Team 5D's too!
I'll prove I can hold my own!

V0206_01_00_05_0.text: Akiza, can you teach me some new techniques to baffle Leo?

V0206_01_00_06_0.text: Leo, you actually have some cool moves to show me?

V0206_01_00_07_1.text: For hurting the spirits and the one I love!

V0206_01_00_08_0.text:
I'll fight alongside Leo!
And my friends!

V0206_03_00_05_0.text: I have to do something while I still can...

V0206_05_00_00_0.text:
The spirits in my deck!
I call on your help!

V0206_07_09_00_0.text: I flip over my face-down card!

V0206_08_00_00_0.text: I equip the Equip Spell, Horn of the Unicorn!

V0206_08_00_01_0.text: Horn of the Unicorn returns to the top of my deck.

V0206_08_00_02_0.text: I'll activate the Spell Card, Emergency Assistance!

V0206_08_00_03_0.text: I activate the Spell Card, Rain of Mercy!

V0206_08_00_04_0.text: I activate the Field Spell, Ancient Forest!

V0206_08_00_05_1.text: Monsters aren't allowed to fight among these trees!

V0206_08_00_06_0.text: I activate my Spell, Swords of Revealing Light!

V0206_08_00_08_0.text: I activate the Spell Card, Ancient Leaf!

V0206_08_00_08_1.text: By paying 2000 Life Points, I draw two cards from my deck.

V0206_08_00_09_0.text: I activate my Spell Card, Fairy of the Spring!

V0206_08_00_10_0.text:
I reveal my Continuous Trap!
Pixie Ring!

V0206_08_00_11_0.text:
I flip over my Trap Card!
Gift Card!

V0206_08_00_12_0.text:
I activate my Trap!
Present Card!

V0206_08_00_12_1.text: You discard your entire hand and draw five new cards!

V0206_08_00_13_0.text: I activate the Continuous Trap, Solemn Wishes!

V0206_08_00_14_0.text:
I flip over my Trap Card!
Fairy Wind!

V0206_08_00_15_0.text:
I activate my Quick-Play Spell!
Limiter Removal!

V0206_08_00_17_0.text: Leo is always with me, along with his shield!

V0206_08_00_18_0.text: I equip the Equip Spell, Pain to Power!

V0206_08_00_19_0.text: I'll change these stings into strength!

V0206_08_00_20_0.text: I'll activate the Spell Card, Double Ripple!

V0206_08_00_20_1.text: Help me, Ancient Fairy Dragon and Power Tool Dragon!

V0206_09_00_00_0.text: Here's Spirit of the Breeze's effect!

V0206_09_00_01_1.text: I Special Summon a Level 4 or lower monster from my hand!

V0206_09_00_05_1.text: If my deck's top card is an Equip Spell, I get to have it!

V0206_09_00_06_0.text: Spore's effect activates from the Graveyard!

V0206_09_00_08_1.text: I return a Field Spell in my Graveyard to my deck!

V0206_09_00_09_0.text: Bird of Roses activates its effect!

V0206_09_00_10_0.text: If an effect adds Watapon to my hand, I can summon it!

V0206_09_00_13_1.text: When a Field Spell activates on my turn, I draw a card!

V0206_09_00_14_0.text:
Since there's a Field in play...
Go, Ancient Pixie Dragon!

V0206_09_00_14_1.text: Destroy a monster in face-up Attack Position!

V0206_09_00_15_1.text: 1000 Life Points are coming back to me!

V0206_09_00_17_0.text: I activate Mystical Fairy Elfuria's effect!

V0206_09_00_22_0.text: Spirit of the Fall Wind activates her effect!

V0206_09_00_25_0.text: Power Tool Dragon adds an Equip Spell to my hand!

V0206_09_00_26_0.text: Power Tool Mecha Dragon's drawing effect activates!

V0206_09_00_27_0.text: Power Tool Mecha Dragon's effect activates!

V0206_11_01_00_0.text: I Summon a monster in Defense Position!

V0206_13_00_00_0.text:
Come to me!
Spirit of the Breeze!

V0206_37_00_00_0.text: The magic that lives in each creature merge and become one!

V0206_13_00_02_0.text:
The mighty, the majestic...
Ancient Fairy Dragon!

V0206_13_00_03_0.text:
It's okay.
Come on out, Key Mace.

V0206_13_00_07_0.text: I know you'll fight for me, Jerry Beans Man!

V0206_13_00_15_1.text:
Whoa!
You said you were old, but I didn't think THAT old!

V0206_13_00_16_0.text: Fairy King Truesdale arrives to protect my spirits!

V0206_37_00_01_0.text: The spirit of the ancient forest takes solid form!

V0206_13_00_27_0.text:
Spirit of the Fall Wind!
Let's go!

V0206_37_00_02_0.text: Machine and might combine to bring peace to the world!

V0206_13_00_30_0.text: I know you can win, Power Tool Dragon!

V0206_37_00_03_0.text: If you wanna feel the steel, be my guest!

V0206_19_00_07_0.text: Slash 'em with your sword, Jerry Beans Man!

V0206_19_00_27_0.text: Spirit of the Fall Wind! Attack!

V0206_28_00_01_0.text: I promised Ancient Fairy that I'd protect both our worlds.

V0206_28_00_02_0.text:
I win!
But you gave me lots of tips to work on!

V0206_28_00_03_0.text: I can tell you really love your deck.

V0206_28_00_04_1.text:
I learned them from you!
And from all my friends!

V0206_28_00_06_0.text:
Sheesh, you need to try harder.
Or you'll never be #1!

V0206_28_00_07_0.text: I didn't win on my own.

V0206_28_00_07_1.text: I won because Leo and my friends have my back!

V0206_28_00_08_0.text:
I won't lose!
Not when my hero's looking after me!

V0206_29_00_00_0.text:
I'm sorry.
I lost despite the support of my friends...

V0206_29_00_01_0.text:
Phew...
This Duel was a workout...

V0206_29_00_02_0.text:
That was the best I could do.
Will you help me improve?

V0206_29_00_03_0.text:
I'll be fine.
Because I still have something to fight for!

V0206_29_00_04_0.text:
I'm not worried.
With your help, I can get stronger!

V0206_29_00_05_0.text: That's why you're the best student at the Academy, Akiza.

V0206_29_00_05_1.text: I have a lot to work on if I want to reach your level.

V0206_29_00_06_0.text:
Leo, you've changed.
You're more... mature.

V0206_29_00_06_1.text: Like you're an ACTUAL big brother!

V0206_29_00_07_1.text:
That I would protect both our worlds...
But I failed...

V0206_30_00_01_0.text: You're talking more than usual today.

V0206_30_00_02_0.text: Sigh... Why do you always cry?

V0206_33_00_02_0.text: I won't let you hurt anyone!

V0206_34_00_01_0.text: I can tell that you cherish your deck!

V0206_34_00_03_0.text: I'm counting on you, big bro.

V0206_34_00_08_0.text:
What will today's card be?
This one!

V0206_32_00_01_0.text:
Which app will I play today?
This one!
Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links! Yeah!
Let's win again today!

V0206_35_00_00_0.text: I'm also a vital member of Team 5D's!

V0206_36_00_00_0.text: The rest is up to you!

V0206_36_00_03_0.text: Don't get carried away just because we're winning.

V0206_36_00_06_0.text:
Just a little more.
We can do this!

V0206_36_00_08_0.text:
It'll be fine.
Because we have an unbreakable bond.
